alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 7:54PM EST until February 27 at 2:48AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.5 feet, Sang Branch Road is under water at Red Lick Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 20.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue to a crest of 21.3 feet by early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage by Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued AT 11 PM.
